author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
summary: ...GABRIELLE STRUGGLING OVER THE CENTRAL ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 AM AST Thu Sep 18 the center of Gabrielle was located near 20.0, -50.3 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Gabrielle (AT2/AL072025)
